message:
"Take up one Idea, Make that one idea your Life "-Swami Vivekananda
The hard work and countless sleepless nights put up by the team bore fruit this Durga Puja. Team ProDex was selected to participate in the Clinton Global Initiative University (CGI U) hosted at the University of Chicago from 19th October to 21st October, 2018. Amidst the enthusiasm among the fellow attendees and the inspiring speeches given by distinguished leaders including former US President Clinton, the team felt ecstatic to present two of their projects focussing on the problems of pollution and food wastage in India. 
CGIU is a platform to compete and collaborate between innovative solutions for tackling pressing global challenges through knowledge building with topic experts and university representatives from around 200 countries. With the enriching exposure at CGI U, the team is more focused than ever to work towards their commitment to “turning ideas into reality”.
#cgiu2018

Register on the following link to get further information about the time and venue of the session: https://tinyurl.com/kpitsparkle-19

message:
It was a wonderful experience for our team to discuss and share diverse and innovative ideas during our associate team member recruitment drive over the past few days.
After multiple rounds of deliberation and discussion, we are proud to announce that the following students have been selected to be the part of our Team.
Welcome to the ProDex Family! Keep up the desire to explore and learn as we enter the world of Product Designing!!

message:
Life is like riding a bicycle... To have balance you need to keep moving... Apart from the times the cycle chain comes off!
Do you still hate being hurdled by small problems which could be easily solved if you were just a little more curious, a little more innovative? Push your brain a little more!
Comment below with product ideas and get a chance to win exciting goodies!!

Life is like riding a bicycle... To have balance you need to keep moving... Apart from the times the cycle chain comes off!
Do you still hate being hurdled by small problems which could be easily solved if you were just a little more curious, a little more innovative? Push your brain a little more!
Comment below with product ideas and get a chance to win exciting goodies!!

"Necessity is the mother of invention"
Tired of adjusting with the troubles? Want to solve or work on a problem that matters??
We are here to help you out with it. Lets start with this problem and see how possibilities outwit each other creating a marvel in itself. 
Come up with an idea( a physically implementable solution) to tackle this midnight dilemma. 
Lets hear you out in the comments below. Goodies await the best solutions!

Lets hear you out in the comments below. Goodies await the best solutions!

“Sound Ideas and true innovation are meant to change the world”. Showcasing their enthusiasm and inclination towards innovations, our team 'Fire-Axe' was announced as the winner of Product Design competition 'PROD-D' which was organized by Prakriti, IIT Kharagpur on 17th March 2018. The product is a farm machine which aims to reduce the widespread burning of farm residue that serves as a prime contributor to the alarming pollution levels in the capital city.
In turn, it promises to turn the waste into a potential economic resource for the farmers. The team is working hard towards the prototype and implementation of the solution. We congratulate the team for their efforts towards solving this global challenge of air pollution and climate change.  
PC: Vipul Banjarey
story: ProDex is with Puneet Pachauri and 7 others.

message:
“When opportunity presents itself, don’t be afraid to go after it.”
And keeping this in mind, there has been no looking back from the time we got started. Following the streak of showcasing our enthusiasm and zeal for erudition and moulding our ideas into innovative products, our product Evapo - Reefer was announced as the winner of Product Design Idea Competition conducted in Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2018 by E-Cell, IIT Kharagpur on 3rd February, 2018.The product was aimed to improve the life of consumable commodities during transportation and to reduce food wastage in supply chain by designing a power efficient cold storage transportation system. We congratulate the team for adding another feather in their beret !
story: ProDex is with Naveen Nagar and 7 others.

message: We feel contented to announce that our team got selected to demonstrate a model in the International Semi-Finals of Masterpiece 2017 organised by Living Talent held at Dubai from 13December,2017 to 18 December,2017. Our product Vibronot was shortlisted for the Grand Finale after a tough competition in the semi-finals and was adjudged as one of the best solution for controlling the Parkinson’s Disease.The model made by the team was staged by their representatives Anurag Goyaland Shyama Agrawal. The team got to interact with Mr. RoopamSharma (Top 8 innovators Under 35 in MIT technology review for his invention to replace braille language) and Mr. Mayur Ramgir (International award winning author) who are experts in the field of innovations and entrepreneurship. We applaud the whole team for their hard work inachieving a colossal platform.
story: ProDex added 4 new photos — with Anjali Bharti and 5 others.

message:
We are proud to announce that 2 teams of Prodex, majorly comprising of 1st year students bagged the 2nd and 4th positions at Open IIT Product Design Competition held on 3rd September, 2017. Our heartiest congratulations to all the participants.
 
Our silver winning product Evapo-reefer was designed for the efficient transportation of fruits and vegetables over long distances. The product was based on the concept of evaporative cooling and could help in solving food wastage due to ineffective food storage and transportation facilities.
#Silver
#Open_IIT
#Prodex
